name: ForRin
description:
Move: W

Direction: Monse Move

Attack: Mouse LB

Skill: R

The peaceful monster world ruled by Rin, the best monster, but when Rin dies, the monsters compete with each other to become Rin.

GamePlay: Less than six players have real-time battles.By hunting AI or players, you can gain experience and evolve, and users battle to become Rin with various strategies.

Evolution - Spook Skill - Egglet Attack - egglet
